summary: Frontend-only testing completed for ConversAI book chat redesign. All core features working: landing page renders with warm cream theme, auth pages load correctly with email/password/Google sign-in, public routes (/books, /discover, /pricing) return 200, authenticated route /d correctly redirects to sign-in.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - no health endpoint defined in Next.js API routes (not critical since backend is a proxy to Next.js)

critical_code_review_comments: MINOR: PublicShell.tsx footer links for About, Blog, Careers don't link anywhere (just spans)
MINOR: Missing data-testid attributes on some interactive elements like navigation links in header
test_credentials: None required - only public pages tested
context_for_next_testing_agent: App is a Next.js 15 app at /app (not /app/frontend). Auth pages use Neon Auth with dynamic imports (ssr: false). Middleware at /app/middleware.ts protects /d/* routes. Book library shows 95 books. Warm cream theme (#FAF9F6) is correctly applied.

landing_page.details: Hero section, navigation, CTA buttons, features, pricing, FAQ, footer all render correctly

auth_sign_in.details: Email/password fields, Google sign-in button, sign-up link all visible

auth_sign_up.details: Name/email/password fields, Google sign-in button, sign-in link all visible

books_page.details: Shows 95 books, search input, sort dropdown, navigation, footer all working

discover_page.details: Category cards with topic chips, Find Books button, navigation working

d_route_redirect.details: /d correctly returns 307 redirect to /auth/sign-in when not logged in

css_styling.details: Warm cream theme (#FAF9F6 = rgb(250, 249, 246)) correctly applied

faq_accordion.details: 4 FAQ items found with data-testid, accordion expands/collapses correctly
